drug.name: Nefopam
drug.description: Nefopam is under investigation for the prevention of Cholecystitis and Post Anaesthetic Shivering. Nefopam has been investigated for the prevention of Kidney Transplantation.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as aralkylamines. These are alkylamines in which the alkyl group is substituted at one carbon atom by an aromatic hydrocarbyl group.

drug-interaction.name: Morphine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Morphine can be increased when used in combination with Nefopam.

drug-interaction.name: Acetaminophen
drug-interaction.description: Acetaminophen may increase the analgesic activities of Nefopam.
